Indonesia: The Portuguese establish a fort on Tidore but the main centre for Portuguese activities in Maluku becomes Ambon.
Estonia: Balthasar Russow publishes his cronicles about the Livonian War.
Chile: Francis Drake attacks the coast of Chile during his circumnavigation of the earth; La Serena and Valparaíso are plundered.
Bangladesh: Mughal Subahdar Khan Jahan invades the Bhati region of East Bengal, but is defeated by Isa Khan and his allies, near Kishoreganj.
